title: The Double
description: Can he tell us apart with a kiss? From the author of Mount Mercy and Alaska Wild comes a standalone romantic suspense that will leave your heart pounding.Konstantin. A mob boss so powerful, he controls senators and judges. He’s ruthless. Gorgeous. All of New York knows his name. Me? I’m invisible. As an FBI surveillance specialist, I spend my life watching Konstantin and he’s never once noticed the shy girl taking photos from across the street.But when Konstantin’s beautiful but evil “companion,” Christina, is injured in a car crash, the FBI gets a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to bring him down. They use plastic surgery to make me look just like her and send me into his mansion in her place. I need to stay focused, because if he suspects for one second that I’m not her, he’ll kill me. But every time he pushes me up against the wall and growls in that Russian accent, I go weak.I soon learn that his relationship with Christina was empty and cold...but the feelings we have for each other are becoming all too real. There’s more to Konstantin than anyone knows. That cold, evil exterior hides a soul-deep pain and a fierce, protective heart. I know he’s the enemy but I’m falling for him. And I need to know, is he falling for her...or me?Standalone Russian Mafia Romantic Suspense with guaranteed HEA
author: Helena Newbury
